title: Specific heat - double volume of water

content.question: The thermal energy required to bring a volume <math alttext="V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>V</mi></math> of water from room temperature to its boiling point is <math alttext="Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Q</mi></math>. How much energy would be required to bring a volume <math alttext="2 V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>V</mi></math> of water from room temperature to its boiling point?

choices.label: <math alttext="the square root of 2, end root, Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mi>Q</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
